Name: Mira
About the game: Mira is a Slavic-themed visual novel game with point and click and adventure games elements. It is about the magical journey of the titular heroine. From destroyed during world war II city of Cracow, she travels to a world of Slavic myths and legends. Will she find the true meaning of her destiny and endure among creatures forgotten long ago by history? Learn where were hiding water nymphs, imps and drowners? All this player will discover while traversing through the mystical world of Navia. Which, thanks to hand-painted art, interesting puzzles and unique music may be closer than ever before!
